name: Pythagorean Theorem
description: Solve triangles with the Pythagorean Theorem
contents: Cathetus By Pythagoras - Computes the length of one of the catheti / legs of a right triangle using the Pythagorean Theorem. B is the other leg / cathetus of the triangle while C is the hypotenuse., Hypotenuse By Pythagoras - Computes the length of the hypotenuse of a right triangle using the Pythagorean Theorem. A and B are the legs / catheti of the triangle.
